page.title: 03The Surfers (Beach Bums)
page.content: The{Surfers}are those people who can be found at St Ouen's at every available moment, waiting for the swell. Even in winter they will be there in their wet-suits. One group are those who started surfing in the early 60's and still enter competitions in{The Masters}events. They brought the Californian surfing jargon eg "Wipe Outs" "360's" "Getting radical" "Ripping" Some youngsters start at 8 yrs old, though most are in the 15 to 25 bracket. Many of Jersey's surfers do well in National events and local surfer{Arlene Maltman}is the current European Ladies Champion. They take their holidays in September/October, Biarritz and Morocco being popular regular venues and Tenerife, Hawaii, Australia and South Africa a once in a lifetime pilgrimage.
